name: avgle.com dark theme
description: Make you happen using avgle.com at night.
additional_info: Use AdGuard for other ad blocking for best experience. Adds these two rules below into AdGuard, and avoid loading any ad related scripts: ||ads.adxadserv.com/ad$domain=avgle.com,third-party ||adserver.juicyads.com^$domain=avgle.com,third-party
